comments.creator: jhammink@mozilla.com
comments.author: jhammink@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Please let me know what, if any, additional information is needed.  I can also reproduce this error when running crashtests from within gdb

Mac OSx Version 10.7.1,Build 11B26

To repro:
1.Build nightly on mac from source (October 3, 2011)
2. cd to object directory
3. run 'make crashtest'

Crashtest runs but eventually causes the browser to crash.  The following is the output from the terminal:

++DOMWINDOW == 77 (0x1176b2268) [serial = 4387] [outer = 0x107972710]

Mac OSx Version 10.7.1,Build 11B26

comments.creator: ted@mielczarek.org
comments.text: Not sure why you think this is a Breakpad bug, or what it has to do with bug 573290? I don't see a crash at all in that log, FWIW. Why do you say it's crashing? (Your second log shows a leak, but not any crash.)
comments.raw_text: Not sure why you think this is a Breakpad bug, or what it has to do with bug 573290? I don't see a crash at all in that log, FWIW. Why do you say it's crashing? (Your second log shows a leak, but not any crash.)
